heading: This Afternoon
text: Partly cloudy, except mostly sunny southeast, and partly to mostly cloudy in the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley. Chance of a mountain flurry north. Near-steady temperatures from the upper 20s to mid 30s, some mid 20s far north. West winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly cloudy north, becoming mostly clear south. Lows from zero to 10 above, cold hollows around 5 below. Winds becoming light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: A mix of sun and clouds, except mostly cloudy in the St. Lawrence Valley, with the chance of a sprinkle or flurry there. Highs from the mid 30s to around 40, some lower 30s northeast and in the St. Lawrence Valley. Winds becoming south 5 to 15 mph.
